code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     openTracing = new OpenTracingTracer().     openTracing.init(context).     return context. }

@Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     JndiRegistry registry = super.createRegistry().     registry.bind("tracer", NoopTracerFactory.create()).     return registry. }
@Test public void testZipkinConfiguration() throws Exception {     assertNotNull(openTracing.getTracer()).     assertTrue(openTracing.getTracer() instanceof NoopTracer). }
